content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping when i heard a low frequency sound.I was scared to move but after working up the courage, i reached for my phone where i messaged my mom. i heard he phone going off, but she wasn't responding. i then decided to use the find my iphone app where i "pinged"  her phone. i accidentally pinged my sisters when i heard shuffling and the phone abruptly going quiet. i pinged it again, but this time no noise was heard, except for the sound of whatever made the shuffling noise. whatever it was started talking in a strange language that is made up of weird sounds and clicks. there was another one that responded, when my mom suddenly text me back in a unusual manner(short phrases). she said that she was ok, and asked if i wanted to come down. in the morning i asked her if she remembers texting me at late around 3 in the morning. she said that she did not such thing, i showed he the texts and she said, "that wasn't me". we have a camera in our living room where the events took place, but all video feed from around that time had been wiped.
content.summary: Did not see land, woke up because of low frequency sound. tried to message mom.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the nigh sky with a night vision device when i managed to capture a bright object/ ufo, and when the ufo got close to me it started to make a sound and it quits making the sound as soon as it got behind the tree line, i don't think it was a computer problem or anything like that because you can still hear the background noise when ufo is making the sound. the most intriguing of this event is that i never heard that noise while i was recording the ufo, i just noticed the sound when i was taking a look at the videos i recorded that night, i was going to delete it because it didn't seem interesting but that sound is just awesome.I have had incredible ufo sightings but this is the first one with sound. i still can't believe it.
content.summary: Awesome ufo sighting making an incredible sound, wow!

content.detailedDescription:
Just a little after 11:00pm on sunday sept 11,2011, i got off the couch to close and lock the inside front door for the night and noticed thru the screen door 3 huge fiery looking redish orange balls appear above the tree tops coming from the direction of lakeside mall in sterling heights,mi. they were moving slowly south above hayes ave. i yelled for my sister celeste (who was sharing the apartment with me)to come outside.  we both stood out front of our one story apartment and watched with amazement the triangular formation w/o sound for about a minute or two and i wondered out loud if they could all be connected to each other and just then the one on the bottom left trailed behind for about 2 seconds then quickly returned to its spot as if to show me they were not connected. i told my sister to stay put as i ran back into the apartment to grab my new digital camera. i was prob gone only about 15 seconds and when i returned i noticed that they were moving more in a southeastern direction ascending up towards the clouds. it had been a nice day with mild temperatures and only a few clouds high up. i would guess we witnessed the whole event for about 4 minutes before they disappeared into the clouds.  unfortunately, i was unable to get a picture because of my nervousness and lack of knowledge on how to use the camera that all i managed was a picture of the back of my sister's head.  i felt so disappointed that i couldn't capture a photo or a video for evidence. i said to my sister that no one is going to believe us. she said something that big above a busy road like hayes ave had to be seen by others that we couldn't be the only ones and went to bed. i was disappointed in her lack of interest and wanted so bad to talk more about it.  i did however call the sterling heights police department the next day to ask if they got any calls the night before around 11:10pm of the same sighting and i was told "no" and that it was probably just weather balloons from selfridge air national guard base..Which is located about 10 miles east of my apartment.  they definately were not weather balloons.  
i had not heard of mufon until a couple of week ago when i attended a talk at a local library about ufo's and was told to tell my story.  thank you for your time.
content.summary: 3 huge red/orange fiery balls in a triangular formation, equally spaced apart w/o sound slowly ascending above treetops into the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
What i am really interested in is if anyone else reported seeing the same thing in and around the same time as i saw these objects.

i was in grade school (not sure what grade) between grade 4-7 and i was walking home for lunch.  my route brought me through the park behind my house where the public schools yards were, i went to catholic school.  as i was getting closer to my house i noticed these 3 objects hovering and moving slowly (in a row) coming from the south.  they were low i would guess 50-100 ft from the ground.  i couldn't figure out what they were.  they were shaped like diamond and triangle put together, they were dark , they were completely silent.  i went through a checklist in my head, helicopter-no, balloon- no, kite-no.  they were moving too slow to be an airplane (besides looking nothing like an airplane).  i looked at the other children in the school yard to see if they were also looking at the objects and they weren't.  i watched as they passed over my head and drifted west over the roofs of the houses and i lost sight of them.  i didn't feel scared or anything just curious.  i remember thinking that i was just a kid and no one else was looking at them so there must be an explanation that i just didn't think of, but all these years later i still don't know what i saw.  the other factor that made me dismiss what i saw was that they came from the direction of the airport which is less than 20-30 km south of us.  lately i have been recounting the experience in my mind and i just wonder if anyone else reported something like this around those years in brampton canada or if you guys have an alternative explanation.  thanks
content.summary: I saw 3 objects flying together over the school yard and park area when i was a child on my way home for lunch

content.detailedDescription:
Headed south on hwy 170 from page ave as i do m-f early in the morning around 5am. in the distance i see what appears to be a star/planet near the horizon at around olive. i'm always looking at the sky so when i saw what i thought was a star or planet i payed attention to it. the further i traveled i could tell it wasn't a star but looked more like a light of a plane coming in for a landing. i was as fixated on this light as much as i could be since i was driving. i could tell it was pretty low and thought maybe it was a helicopter with a spot light on. by time i got close to my hwy 40 west exit, the brightness of the light was faded but still luminated. there were a single light on each corner and a bigger brighter light in the middle of the craft and as i drove nearly underneath it i saw a dimmer light towards the rear on the bottom that i can only describe as a cargo/service light and it appeared that i was actually looking into the craft. after it has passed me and was north of me i could tell it was very flat, no jet engine noise for being that close and it seemed to pick up speed but not overly fast. it was headed towards lambert and i think i remember it veering north west. i had submitted a ufo report on a website that morning but do not remember what site. i did have more details such as the color of the lights on the tips. guessing i think the front was red, the right tip green and the left tip blue.
it was different enough that i didn't want to lose focus of it to get my camera on my phone ready, i doubt with it being so dark it would have captured it or pull over to listen for sound. i purely enjoyed looking and knowing i'm seeing something very different.
content.summary: Distant star turning into plane landing light turned into triangle flying object

content.detailedDescription:
i had just poured a cup of coffee and walked to front window of my house and a bright light it my eye. i thought how funny it was that i happen to look at the same time a cop had shown his spot light down the street that intersects my street just to the left of my driveway. my coffee was still to hot to drink so i was blowing on it and test sipping it when i noticed a bright light coming toward me from the west. first thing that came to mind was the police were searching for a pedestrian in the neighborhood. then the entire view from my window was completely eliminated and a cylinder with a white dome floating above the road stopped at the intersection to the left of my driveway and shined a light down the west side of the street and then the east. out of the bottom of the cylinder it looked like something was molting producing a bright white and blue glow. then the doom rotated to face the street heading east and leaned slightly forward and moved down the street. at the intersection the doom made a complete 360 degree turn and then faced north, leaned forward and moved out of sight heading north. i got one more glimpse of it heading west at the end of the block that tees into my road at the left of my driveway.
     after it got light i walked out to the road and it had left no residue. during the time the craft was in front of my house i had tried to move and found i couldn't lift my feet.
content.summary: I watched a cylinder object beam a light down street in front of my house.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the road after staying at a friends house for the day. as i was entering the highway, i noticed some lights heading east. being an avid plane spotter, i parked my car on the roadside, grabbed my binoculars, and went outside. i then noticed another set of lights entering the airspace. i could tell this second formation was air national guard f-16cs the other formation, however, was like no other plane i had seen before. and i have seen a lot of planes and known their characteristics! these matched none of those characteristics. at first i thought that they might have been an rc stunt plane, as i have seen some that can pull crazy loops and stuff. but who would be flying an rc at night? the objects were dagger or diamond shaped, and were executing maneuvers that resembled immlemans, pugachev's cobra, and others. then apparently, the ang f-16s lit their burners and flew at the objects. then all of a sudden the objects changed to a heading north and flew off at very high speed. no landing occured. this encounter left me awestruck at what the heck they could be.
content.summary: 3 strange diamond like craft executing strange maneuvers with air national guard aircraft in airspace

content.detailedDescription:
On april 22, 2016 at approximately 9:20 am est, my co-worker and i were driving to work. there were no clouds in the sky, the sky was blue.The address was approximately 1405 ottawa street north in kitchener. we were actually on lackner blvd heading over the hill beside 1405 ottawa street north, heading toward victoria street on lackner blvd. as we came over the hill my co-worker and i saw a very large white oval shaped object over top of some apartments in the (near) distance. 
my co-worker and i both saw the object and we both tried to understand what it could possibly be that was so big and hovering in the sky. we both could not identify what it could have been. there were no wings, lights, windows or airplane tail that we could see and it was not moving but hovering. we both asked one another if we see the object and we both tried to place what it could be and we were not able to name or associate what the giant white object could be hovering over the apartments in the distance. 
my co-worker and i both say that the object was oval and at least 50 meters long and just over half the width and approximately 1 to half a kilometer over some brown buildings in the distance. as we looked at one another to talk and look back to the object it was gone. it was not anywhere in the sky. we actually looked everywhere around us to look for the object in the sky and it was nowhere. it seemed to have vanished. 
if i am generous my co-worker and i  looked and talked to each other for five seconds. i am sure that it was even shorter than that but five seconds is still a very short time for an object that large to just disappear in such a short amount of time with no trace. 
there is an airport approximately twenty kilometers away but i have seen airplanes take off and land in the area for years and this was not an airplane and my co-worker agrees. we are submitting this because i we sure we are not the only ones to have had this experience on that day.
content.summary: I was on my way to work with my co-worker and he and i saw a large white object in the sky as we came over the hill. we looked away for maybe 5 seconds and it disappeared from the sky completely. not trace anywhere...In a maximum of 5 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: It was mother's day morning around 4:20 a.M. as usual on my late night work binges on my laptop when i decided to step outside of my home for a smoke. about half way through the cigarette, i looked up and to my left for a normal star gaze when i notice a glowing orange ball of light moving left to right and then pausing, as if it picked up on my noticing its apparent presence. as i continued to stare in amazement at the more than commonly seen orange/white fireballish ufo that i've encountered many times, including one time with it appearing literally less than 100 ft across the street from me and hovering slowly as if it was imperative that it be seen by me and me alone...It was back. it made a motion in the sky as if it were coming towards me, both moving forward and descending when i heard a loud rustling in the woods across the street from me and there i saw it. a greyish being peeking out almost as if peeking around a doorway or corner, from behind a bush just short of being in the street, staring directly at me. with no sound at all, it blinked and moved the bush back into place without so much as a leave crunch, and it was gone and i, with fear, fascination and clear instructions of not to panic or fear, retreated walking backwards calming frantic, into my house and the same mothers day night, a ufo appeared that both my girlfriend and me witnessed around 11pm ish, then the bright white light that literally brought me to tears as it slowly passed overhead, less than 500 feaet away and in a path that lead directly over my house. my girlfriend was a witness to that as well...Two days of close encounters of the second, third and maybe fourth kind...At the end of it all, i have a hard ball like object in my right ear to go along with the et encounter scoop scar from last thanksgiving on my left wrist. ive spoken to mufon about past encounters and events and have a folder's worth of footage and other information i guarantee would be useful in unveiling the truth. we are not alone, by any means. i've seen things i cant describe any other way than with the self explanation of "now, i know the truth."
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Last three days have been ufo/otherworldy driven, from sightings to close encounters with actual beings

content.detailedDescription:
1 watching tv 
2 my brain telling me to look out the window
3 no idea
4it was roundish ,  had red and green shining lights and turned sharply ,  had no sound & was very fast
5 i was pretty shocked
6it went behind trees on a hill
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Roundish ,  sharp turns , no sound ,

content.detailedDescription:
at approx 6:45am i heard a very large sound emanating from all around the sky. this sounded like a gigantic fog horn which lasted about 2 secs. this sound was omnidirectional and could be felt vibrating the air and felt inside the chest cavity..
  as i opened the door to go outside i saw the security guard at the main gate step out of his guardhouse and look to the sky. there was nothing visable, however the sky was quite overcast.  i returned inside and got a cup of coffee and stepped onto my backdeck and sat down, i then realized that the sky was no longer overcast and the sun was coming up. the signifacence of this being that less than 5 mins had transpired. 
  this sounded very much like the movie "close encounters of the 3rd kind"
when the craft tried to first communicate with sounds. a very large deep claxon like sound. i have lived here for several years and know there is nothing around capable of making that sound as it was completely surrounding the area.
content.summary: loud sound emanating from the entire sky

content.detailedDescription: Just look at the video...Keep playing and pausing you will see the object..
content.summary: Three object zoom in three different colors...Play and pause you will see the object which its looks like a gray metal round shape.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my dogs taking pics of a sunset. i noticed these orbs while photographing but could not see them with the naked eye. i tried to edit them and in the one, i can see a grey black looking being.
content.summary: Outside taking photos of sunset. i could not see this from the naked eye

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I'm patrice joseph from trinidad and tobago in the caribbean, where we don't usually have any ufo sightings at all, so my story is hugely mind boggling and unusual. it was mother's day a few days ago on the evening of 8th may 2016 my family was returning home from the day out. i was sitting in the back seat while we were driving along the highway and just 5 mins away from home.  it was still bright out not yet sunset and i was just gazing out my backseat window to the western side up at the sky looking at the thin sliver of the moon as started showing up. 
out of nowhere what seemed a short distance away from the moon's location a bright white light just appeared in the sky with a greenish-bluish tint, the size of what seemed to be quarter of a what a typical full moon's size would be, it looked rectangular-ish in shape no sharp edges very soft and it just shot across the sky in a straight line from north to south very quickly,(covered a distance of about 50 feet or so not sure maybe more) it took about 5 seconds in all with no noise, nothing, it just got smaller and circular and totally disappeared!!! at first i started thinking hmmm...Ok omg a really huge shooting star but then i was like what the heck this is somethihng else because it did not fall it was wayyyy bigger and just keep a clean straight line and just zipped across the sky and disappeared just like that!!!! i was totally stoked!!!!I didnt believe it, i doubted myself, nahhhh that's not possible....Then i totally lost it!!!! it really was something unusual!!!!!  my folks got freaked out cause i was like" omg omg omg oh my goodness you will not believe what i saw, i cant believe i saw something, you all would not believe what i saw" i kept repeating myself over and over.....My family finally got me to explain myself, mom looked at the time it was 6:41 pm and she opened the sunroof to see if they could spot it also. but we saw nothing else as we pulled up to my house...I quickly ran outside to show everyone what i saw, where i saw it and the details....It was truly remarkable...! i cant believe i saw my first ufo! what a mother's day ending!!!!..Seriously???? omg.
content.summary: Bright white bluish-green rectangular light shape, quarter moon sized, appeared in the sky zipped from north to south in 5seconds the disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was parking a truck out back in st catharines ontario and got out i looked up and saw this light it was not a white light but more of an orange glow the plane travel to buffalo was behind me going east this thing was going south i didn't see blinking lights like the planes going by and the hazy cloud cover it disappeared i waited to see if it was going to keep its slow direct travel path to clear skies but it never did i started taping b/c i couldn't recognize it i'm a us vet and worked for 5 years at detroit airport i know what a plane looks like i said i need to tape this and took a pic of before and after it made no noise as later i could hear planes afterwards
content.summary: A glowing orb no sound coming from it it and it went into cloud cover and didn't come out of it

content.detailedDescription: At 12:14 pm i stepped out my apartment door and noticed what looked like a metor falling to earth then the more i looked at it it started pulsing orange and yellow its path was south heading north then another one came from the east and passed over the sandia ice mountains then the one coming from the north started heading towards the one coming from the east and they both hovered for a couple  minutes and started flying together in the same direction then they flew in the clouds going separate directions i was like holy cow did i just see that i've never seen anything like that before
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two ufos meet up and flying together in same direction

content.detailedDescription: A large orb in the sky, moving fast, flew towards the west and last of the sunlight, vanished, and returned in the opposite direction. then it hovered for an hour, very high up.
content.summary: A large orb in the sky, moving fast, flew towards the west and last of the sunlight, vanished, and returned in the opposite direction. then it hovered for an hour, very high up.

content.detailedDescription: I still see them today. 1974 it first started during the summer day.Outside in front of my house, me and my brothers older and sisters. i notice orbs silver like flying across the sky maybe 10 or more flying s.E. about ten seconds later 6 jets flying real low. we giving chase. that was the end of that. brother said it was military,the next year first contact. they came to my window in the middle of the night. back then you can sleep with your windows open. at first they look like kids asking me to come out to play i went but they kept there distances always standing in the dark. 3or4 of them. they wanted to show me there home. o.K i said. thinking down the street, was i wrong. look up one said. i did... spaceship hold on one said. light came down took us up floating. the one big one looked more human metallic uniform he looked like the smaller ones big head big eyes. he told me why i was there. for tests needles lasers open me up with no pain or scares. every second day for a week or so. then it just stopped, i had no memory of it. till the next encounter.Little has past end of summer august 79 10;30 pm standing outside my house looking at the stars.Looking n.E. i seen bright lights coming my way. chopper i was thinking. then out of no where a police officer drove up behide me asked what i was looking at i pointed now he sees what i see.It came to a stop right in front of us 150 feet up. windows open  bright lights you can see them standing there i waved it waved back. the cop is crying beside me. saying you know what this means crying. there is a lot more to this part. he radios airport asking if they had anything low flying around the northend of the city.No they said he told them theres a ufo we looking at right now as we speak, then all hell broke. two days after us army general and few others serounded my house looking for me. the cop said i seen it first,we went to my school to talk hooked up to machines.2 men in suits mib threating me and my family, the same for the cop.   now face to face 1980 just came out of my place going n.W.  10 steps  i notice something in the corner of my eye on right of me across the street for me. i turn to look i see something running into the bush a alien 4 people seen this, one took a photo of it. before it started running away but i did get the chance to talk to it, it was hiding from it captures others beings... there is to much to tell,,,  its been over 30 yrs now they cant hurt me now can they,
content.summary: More than 1 event

content.detailedDescription: Witness (a) and his dog were taking there evening walk, while sitting on “praying rock” for 20 minutes at the ne end of walker lake, suddenly he observed a stationary rectangular harmonica shaped object.  the object was located approximately 4000 feet away, to the sw over the end of the lake, at an altitude of about 300 feet on an inclination angle of 12 degrees.  the object had 10 to 11 red/blue/green/white pulsating not blinking lights along the side facing the witness.  the black rectangular object appeared to have square areas between the lights which provided the impression of a harmonica.  the object length horizontally was half the length of a pencil at arms-length. after observing the object for 10 minutes witness (a) went back home, two blocks, fetched his girl friend to come see the object and she was able to observe the object also.
content.summary: Witness observed a stationary rectangular black harmonica shaped object with 10-11 multi-colored pulsating lights for about 10 minutes duration.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on dutton road in sudbury, ma when a bright, large circular orb flew over the car i was in very low and very fast before disappearing from view.  only lasted a few seconds but it was so large, fast, bright, low and circular that it was unlike any known human-made craft i had ever seen.  upon first seeing it myself and my friend in the passenger seat both agreed it was a ufo immediately, very excited and amazed at the event.  the road i was traveling on was a somewhat major road in this small town with many trees so we only had a quick glimpse of the craft as it flew directly overhead.
content.summary: Bright circular orb that flew over a car i was driving.  also witnessed by passenger, definitely not plane/helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
On april 27, 2016, a former teammate of work in interpol puerto rico sent me two (2) photos taken by his sister with a cell phone while passing the area of the northwest coast of puerto rico. the witness reported that when taking pictures of the coastal area, the images on them were not visible. only seconds after shooting, she checked them observing two (2) images of ufo's.
 
on may 4, 2016, the cell phone was personally checked by me and a third photo of the incident was found. it was the second one that was taken in a chronological sequence. this photo is important because it proves that the windshield had no stains when photos # 1 and 2 were taken. (the photo #3 was not taken thorough the windshield). in photo # 1 draws the attention a visible second flying object in the maritime horizon.  it opens the possibility that there is a relationship between this flying object and the one in the photo #3.

the three (3) photos were taken on february 14, 2016, at 11:46 (photos  #1 and #2) and 11:47 am (photo #3), with a cell phone brand samsung model android 4.2.2. they were moving at a speed of 40 - 45 mph (approx.) on road pr # 2, km. 10.3, (tunel de guajataca area), town of quebradillas, puerto rico. (between the municipal boundaries of the towns of quebradillas and isabela in the northwest coastal area of the island) 

the event occurred at a distance of 10.2 miles (approx.) from the rafael hernandez airport in aguadilla, puerto rico. referencing the northwest coast and the place where the photos were taken, in photo # 3 it can be seen that the ufo appears to move from northeast to southwest, precisely towards the town of aguadilla.
content.summary: Witness took three (3) photos of coastal area. only seconds after shooting, she checked them noticing two (2) images of ufo's.

content.detailedDescription: It's a planet in front or behind moon in sw sky.. one is smaller and slightly higher and off to right.. sum 1 please tell me what planet it is google is showing nothin .. nothin is suppose to be there but 2 nights in a row it's there.. i know i'm not only one seeing this yet no one else is reporting it... first seen last night may 8 2016 at a cook out 6 others seen as well now it's out again to night may 9 2016 but it's off to right more .. last night first noticed double crescent. . opony closer examination i seen it was in fact to planets or moons... sum 1 needs to look now and see what i see. not sure if still be seen 2moro... i took vid wit phone but footage sucks.. can't really tell..
content.summary: There is a planet in front of moon or its behind it.. started last night may 8 2016 is there again tonight may 9 2016.. nothin to indicate what planet is several are witnessing even i'm using binoculars it's definely there in sw sky..

content.detailedDescription: Have pix of two jellyfish type ufos  above clouds the size of new jersey  take a look
content.summary: Saw on google earth not a glitch  i have pix first picture has two could be more  then i got closeup pix red capped giant jellyfish looking see for yourself

content.detailedDescription: These were seen by many, many people while taking pictures of it. it scared a lot of people last night.
content.summary: The two ufo's are posted all over facebook

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my front porch at approximately 9:30 pm. i looked to my left an observed 2 bright white/yellow lights about 20 degrees above the horizon. it caught my attention because these two lights were very bright. typically if it is a helicopter i can hear the blades from the distance that it was at, but i heard nothing. so i watched some more. there are two towers, with red lights to the west and slightly north of my location. this is where the 2 lights lights were hovering. i watched the object move from one tower to the second tower and back to the first tower, while hovering. still all i could see is two bright lights. so i was still thinking helicopter...But there was no sound. then the object moved toward me, to the south west. as i was standing there it became a visible triangle with what i'm assuming are 6  white lights. one in front, middle, and rear of craft. the sides of the craft had smaller lights along the side. this object turned south and headed in a straight line. it was at this point i could hear a sound similar to a jet plane. i did not observe any blinking lights on the craft. i don't know if it could have been an f-35? i don't know of any other jet that hovers, other than a harrier. but what i observed last night looked exactly like the craft reported in st louis recently. 2 large yellow/white lights that hovered the. continued in straight path to reveal its shape, a triangle craft with 6 lights and smaller lights on the side. was cool to see. i didn't go get my phone because i thought it was a helicopter. by the time i realized it was something different it was on its way out of sight. i watched as it disappeared behind the trees to my south west.
content.summary: Triangle with 6 lights and smaller lights on side. hover then path.

content.detailedDescription:
This was recorded from my dash cam on may 7th 2016 about 3:00hrs. on i-5 around the 325 mile mark, heading south. i was traveling with three other trucks who also saw this craft.
i first saw a light sweep the sky on the right side of this video frame. one swept across the sky and a second one occurred a few seconds later. after the second light the first thing i thought was someone was shinning deer.
a couple more second passed and we saw bright white lights on what i thought was a plane moving from right to left out in the distance going across the highway. maybe 2miles out in front of us, very low to the ground.
it crossed the interstate and climbed in attitude and started to circle heading east and than north, and than south returned to roughly the same place it crossed the interstate and crossed back going west, and than the object and lights disappeared. i kept watching out my passenger window to see if i could spot the lights, but i saw nothing. i turned back to watch the road ahead and talking on the cb with the other driver about the strange way that was flying. there was something odd about the way it maneuvered. i notice lights reflecting in my passenger window and thought it was from the oncoming traffic, and i glanced over to see what it was and saw this craft coming straight at me.
i thought it was going to crash into me at that point. it had three very bright white lights. like large round spotlights across the font edge of the vehicle. when i say edge thats all i could make out as it didn’t look to have body or hight to it. as it approached it slowed and turned and banked almost in place at the same time, and came up over my truck. it made no sound, it had no wings, no marking lights, no fuselage, no tail, no plane, no drone, no helicopter.
we were traveling about 60 to 63 mph and as you see it was moving just a bit faster than we were going. it may have bee about 50 ft. above us.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: This happens to be my third encounter

content.detailedDescription:
This is continuation to mufon case # 69903

i was fully awake and not sleeping when a grey alien walked into the room in  saskatchewan,canada

i was doing research on consciousness and olympics were going on at that time.

the grey alien walked into the room and showed me a yellow glowing ball and said we can make a ball of your consciousness and we play olympics silently.
after that alien grey dropped the ball on the floor and i could feel some static charge from the
yellow sphere.

after the blue beam incident the aliens can communicate and teleport themselves from other dimensions as per their wish .Seems blue beam opens a  portal from another dimension.

grey alien aka asgard also said we play olympics silently.
content.summary: Consciousness,alien grey,teleportation

content.detailedDescription: I was showing my 14 year old son the big dipper in the night sky at the weekend. we were camping in the sandy hook area of manitoba in our rv. it was a cool night and he went back inside. i continued to look at the stars as it was a clear night. satellites are often seen whizzing by. i looked again towards the big dipper and noticed a reddish bright light streak slightly within the bowl area of this constellation. it vanished and reappeared then vanished and reappeared in a different location than it should have if it were on a straight path. the light appeared to zigzag in a 'w' patten then disappeared. no planes were visible and no noise could be heard. the light seemed to be a great distance away. i continued to observe the sky and did not see any further lights from this area or surrounding area. i went inside and looked at the clock to get the time knowing i would report this when able. this encounter was yet another oddity i have seen in the night sky. thank you.
content.summary: Bright coloured light observed zigzagging through the sky by the big dipper. then vanished. clear night sky

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were sitting at a near by cemetery around 2:30 am. we pulled over to find his cell phone he dropped while driving me back to a other friends. well i told him to pull over and park in the cemetery because i needed to talk about something anyway. well as he was looking for it 10-15min into our conversation i noticedt this bright silverish - purple light 25-30 feet in front of us right above these trees in the cemetery. i asked him do you see that. he said yes and asked me what is it. i told him i didn't know, and as i'm saying this it was hoovering at a slow pace till it got directly above us.And it sat above us for about 3 minutes. and as it was above us i noticed a pattern on the bottom of this metalic disc. there was 3 glowing circles that glowed red and they were in the form of a triangle and the 3 red glowing circles were outlines not filled. so what i'm trying to explain is the shape of a triangle was for,ed out of 3 circles 2 on bottom and 1 on top of the other 2. and once it was above us and we were looking at it and i noticed the red glowing circles i was hearing this humming sound in my head. anyway after the few minutes past it went from being above us and started to hoover south of us very slow again till it was above this house and it sat 10 feet above this house for another few minutes then disappears like a flash of a diamond. was gone instantly. it scared me that bad because how detailed this thing was that i saw i wasn't able to sleep that night nor the following night because of the fright it gave me.    

i had a photo and audio recording of this  experience  on my old cell phone. that phone has been ruined due to water damage . i still have a photo on my facebook that i posted of it day after it happened in the photo it looks like a glowing orb . but i do not have the audio no more. but the other witness i'd like you guys to interview him also thanks.
content.summary: It appeared out of no were at these treetops around 2:45am
